Package com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml

Provides a simple interface for parsing, validating and extracting node content from XML documents, and also for writing XML documents from a DOM tree.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XMLBuilder
    Package internal interface defining a standard signature for serializing a DOM tree to an XML String.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attribute  
    EPPResolver
    Provides URI to Source resolution service as specified by the URIResolver interface.
    EPPSchemaProvider
    Provide a Schema object for use in validating XML documents.
    EPPWriter
    An EPP-specific implementation of an XMLWriter.
    HandlerFactory
    Provides an implementation of DefaultHandler.
    NamespaceContextImpl
    EPP specific implementation of a NamespaceContext, which maps prefixes to name space URIs and vice versa.
    XMLBuilderSJSXP
    A prefixless XML document builder implementation.
    XMLDocument
    The purpose of an XMLDocument is to provide a simple xpath evaluation interface for extracting node values from an XML document.
    XMLParser
    An XMLParser parses an XML document in String form and generates a DOM representation of the XML document.
    XMLWriter
    An XMLWriter provides a simple interface to build a DOM tree and serialize it to XML format.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParsingException
    Container exception for all exceptions which may be thrown while parsing an XML input stream.

Package com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml Description

Provides a simple interface for parsing, validating and extracting node content from XML documents, and also for writing XML documents from a DOM tree.
